data.lyric:
[ti:Higher (Explicit)]
[ar:John Legend/DJ Khaled/Nipsey Hussle]
[al:Father Of Asahd (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Higher (Explicit) - John Legend (约翰·传奇)/DJ Khaled (DJ哈立德)/Nipsey Hussle (尼普西·哈斯勒)
[00:00.37]Lyrics by：Khaled Khaled/John Stephens/Ermias Asghedom/Kevin "KC" Cossom/HM Henry Davis
[00:00.74]Composed by：Khaled Khaled/John Stephens/Ermias Asghedom/Kevin "KC" Cossom/HM Henry Davis
[00:01.11]DJ Khaled：
[00:01.18]We The Best music
[00:10.18]DJ Khaled
[00:11.57]John Legend：
[00:11.82]Oh you keep taking me higher and higher
[00:18.33]Yeah
[00:20.14]But don't you know that the devil is a liar
[00:23.47]Yeah I know
[00:25.43]They'd rather see me down put my soul in the fire
[00:29.66]But we keep goin' higher higher
[00:32.46]Nipsey Hussle：
[00:33.03]Look look
[00:34.16]My granny 88 she had my uncle and them
[00:36.93]A miscarriage back-to-back every year for like ten
[00:40.11]Pregnant with my mom's doctor told her it was slim
[00:42.74]It was bed robes for nine months but gave birth in the end
[00:45.83]Pops turned 60 he proud what we done
[00:48.56]In one generation he came from Africa young
[00:51.21]He said he met my mom's at the Century Club
[00:53.96]Los Angeles love kinda of like Hussle and Boog
[00:56.98]Mani turned ten Kross turned two
[00:59.89]Startin' to see this life s**t from a bird's view
[01:02.66]We the ones that made millions off the curb fool
[01:04.95]And this rap s**t ten never made nerd moves
[01:07.97]John Legend：
[01:10.52]Oh you keep taking me higher and higher
[01:13.37]Hussle
[01:14.77]Yeah
[01:16.11]Khaled
[01:16.67]But don't you know that the devil is a liar
[01:19.11]Yeah I know
[01:21.65]Right back
[01:22.08]They'd rather see me down put my soul in the fire
[01:26.14]But we keep goin' higher higher
[01:29.43]Nip talk to 'em
[01:30.43]Nipsey Hussle/John Legend：
[01:31.53]Emptied out the clip it was broad day
[01:34.11]F**k n***as always gotta learn the hard way
[01:37.16]We gon' tape it off if we ball play
[01:39.68]Put a half a moon crescent on your bald fade
[01:42.75]Police hit the lights that's a car chase
[01:45.25]Lookin' back at my life make my heart race
[01:48.47]Dance with the devil and test our faith
[01:51.00]I was thinkin' chess moves but it was God's grace
[01:54.13]Crooked a*s whoever 'til we all straight
[01:56.42]With no shame I peeped game and it's all fake
[01:59.31]South Central state of mind high crime rate
[02:01.65]Yeah
[02:01.97]Homicide hate gang banging'll get you all day
[02:04.32]Yeah yeah
[02:06.35]And look at my fate
[02:07.02]John Legend/Nipsey Hussle：
[02:07.52]Oh you keep taking me higher and higher
[02:10.61]Told Khaled bounce the four 'til the bar break
[02:13.08]But don't you know that the devil is a liar
[02:16.96]I know
[02:18.27]They'd rather see me down put my soul in the fire
[02:22.51]But we keep goin' higher higher
[02:25.87]John Legend：
[02:29.50]Higher
[02:32.26]Oh Lord
[02:35.77]Can you feel it
[02:39.29]My shoes are scrapin' the sky
[02:44.89]I'm so high
[02:48.10]We keep goin' higher
data.trans:
[ti:Higher (Explicit)]
[ar:John Legend/DJ Khaled/Nipsey Hussle]
[al:Father Of Asahd (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]//
[00:00.37]//
[00:00.74]//
[00:01.11]//
[00:01.18]We The Best music出品
[00:10.18]DJ Khaled制作
[00:11.57]//
[00:11.82]你一直激励着我 让我奋发图强
[00:18.33]//
[00:20.14]难道你不知道恶魔是骗子吗
[00:23.47]我知道
[00:25.43]他们宁愿看着我意志消沉 让我饱受煎熬
[00:29.66]可我们一直奋发向上
[00:32.46]//
[00:33.03]听我说
[00:34.16]我外婆已经88岁了 她最大的孩子是我舅舅
[00:36.93]后来就接二连三地流产 差不多有10次
[00:40.11]然后才怀上我妈妈 医生告诉外婆 还是有流产的风险
[00:42.74]外婆就在床上躺了9个月 最终成功地生下了妈妈
[00:45.83]爸爸转眼就满60岁了 他以我为荣
[00:48.56]爸爸那一代 他在很小的时候就移民来了美国
[00:51.21]爸爸说 他在Century Club遇见了妈妈
[00:53.96]在洛杉矶发生的爱情 有点像我和孩子他妈Hussle的爱情故事
[00:56.98]Emani转眼就10岁 Kross也满2岁了
[00:59.89]像开了上帝视角 俯瞰整个人生
[01:02.66]我们就靠这些不起眼的东西赚了好几百万 傻瓜
[01:04.95]说唱这件事 让人保持头脑灵光
[01:07.97]//
[01:10.52]你一直激励着我 让我奋发图强
[01:13.37]//
[01:14.77]//
[01:16.11]//
[01:16.67]难道你不知道恶魔是骗子吗
[01:19.11]我知道
[01:21.65]直接反击
[01:22.08]他们宁愿看着我意志消沉 让我饱受煎熬
[01:26.14]可我们一直奋发向上
[01:29.43]Nipsey和他们谈谈
[01:30.43]//
[01:31.53]取下弹夹 这可是大白天
[01:34.11]那些该死的人总要吃点苦头 才能长记性
[01:37.16]如果我掌控全场 就不用那么紧张
[01:39.68]在你光秃秃的头上弄个月牙印记
[01:42.75]警察打开灯 奋起直追 这是一场警车追逐
[01:45.25]回顾人生 让我的心脏怦怦直跳
[01:48.47]刀口舔血 与恶魔共舞 考验着我的忠诚
[01:51.00]我运筹帷幄 后来觉得是上帝的恩典
[01:54.13]卑躬屈膝的小人 可我行得正 做得端
[01:56.42]毫无遗憾 我偷看游戏结果 这全是假象
[01:59.31]带着中南部州的心态 犯罪率居高不下
[02:01.65]//
[02:01.97]杀人 仇恨 帮派争斗 让你整天都要遭罪
[02:04.32]//
[02:06.35]看看我的命运 你就明白
[02:07.02]//
[02:07.52]你一直激励着我 让我奋发图强
[02:10.61]告诉Khaled 一起狂欢 直到酒吧打烊
[02:13.08]难道你不知道恶魔是骗子吗
[02:16.96]我知道
[02:18.27]他们宁愿看着我意志消沉 让我饱受煎熬
[02:22.51]可我们一直奋发向上
[02:25.87]//
[02:29.50]奋发图强
[02:32.26]上帝啊
[02:35.77]你是否感觉到了
[02:39.29]我的鞋子吱吱作响 声音四处回荡
[02:44.89]我很兴奋
[02:48.10]我们一直奋发向上
